meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> is next to the <radical>tree</radical>. What is he doing? He's leaning against it, <kanji>rest</kanji>ing.
readingMnemonic: As he <kanji>rest</kanji>s, he suddenly gets hungry and pulls a <reading>cu</reading>cumber (きゅう) off the tree and bites into it. A good rest isn't complete without some crunchy tree cucumbers.
